project_descr: Strengthening Access to Justice and Human Security in the Three Protocol Areas

outputs.output_descr: This project is intended to strengthen access to justice and human security in the protocol areas for South Kordofan State
This project is intended to strengthen access to justice and human security in Blue Nile State

Outcome 

Rights upheld and protection in accordance with international and national laws through accountable and equitable justice and rule of law institutions. 

Outputs

1. Project Management & Operations (Gender Marker: 0) 

2. People's awareness of their rights is enhanced (Gender Marker: 2) 

3. People have access to an operational legal aid system (Gender Marker: 2) 

4. The justice system's capacity to provide justice is enhanced (Gender Marker: 2) 

5. Capacity of rural courts and traditional leaders to provide justice is enhanced (Gender Marker: 2) 

6. Training capacity of law enforcement institutions is enhanced (Gender Marker: 1)

7. Community policing structures have been established and are operational (Gender Marker: 2) 

8. Local ownership and support to rule of law activities is enhanced and sustained. (Gender Marker 1)
